title: Myntra Cheated me and eKart team is refusing to pick the return item.
selftext:
Guys be careful. 

These online shopping portals are good as long as you get the right item.

The moment you receive a defective or wrong item they wash off their hands stating it's not their responsibility.

I ordered a mochi shoe but instead received a cheap spec inside a mochi shoe box. 

Requested for return, logistics team Ekart is refusing to pick up the item.

https://twitter.com/ChachaSabKa/status/1746167626055733748
